name: PersonalBrain Mind Map File
summary: Learn about .BRAIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: PersonalBrain 6 projects use a new database format that is incompatible with previous versions of the software. However, PersonalBrain 6 will automatically update old "Brains" to the new format when opened.

description: Mind map project created by PersonalBrain, a program used to visualize ideas; saved using XML formatting and contains nodes, links, and properties that make up the conceptual mind map; enables users to save ideas and expand them later.
